text: Inglourious Basterds or Inglorious People is a 2009 German-American war film directed by Quentin Tarantino. It takes place in Nazi-occupied France during World War II in Europe . The movie was rated 4 out of 4 stars by movie reporter Roger Ebert. The film is rated R for rude Profanity and brutal Violence especially American Jewish Soldiers Killing the Nazis in France during the occupation of Nazi Germany. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2009 movies Category:2000s war movies Category:American war movies Category:German movies Category:Movies directed by Quentin Tarantino Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Multilingual movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies about Adolf Hitler Category:Movies about antisemitism Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Inglourious Basterds
